pages.title: Description
pages.text: $(6)Campfire $() is the only thing that can provide warmth when you are surviving in the early, And with the $(6) Spit $() you can cook your catch. $(br2) It requires $(6) Flint and Steel $() to activate.

pages.title: Flint and Steel
pages.text: $(6) Flint and Steel $() is the only ignition tool, but it only has $(c)5 $() points of durability. $(br2) It is now not $(6) Iron Ingot $() and $(6) Flint $() to synthesize, it requires $(6) Round Stone $() and $(6) Flint $() to synthesize.

pages.title: Campfire
pages.text: It needs $(6) Flint and Steel $() to light up. $(br2) It doesn't burn all the time, you have to provide it with $(6) logs $() to keep it burning. $(br2)A must for long term wilderness adventures!

pages.title: Spit
pages.text: Place it on top of the $(6) Campfire $() and light the campfire so you can cook something on the spit to eat.
